one_reviews_text: Excellently captures the idea of transporting to a magical world. Incredible visuals and clear familiarity with the material. Love this

Graphics are like no other app - simply beautiful. I wasn't aware the Rift CV1 could master such great graphics, but it could - even using super sampling 2.0 I got solid 90 fps in this app (using a GTX 1080). Remember to increase super sampling for example using Oculus Tray Tool as much as possible - to make this unique app shine the most.
You're immediately immersed in the story, and can solve riddles, throw hedgehogs and more. $5 is more than a fair price for this app. Touch is supported, risk of nausea is very low. This app may be a nice way to introduce other persons to VR.

I was shocked when this "game" took me about 15 minutes to complete. The graphics (although more like drawings than realistic) were neat and the riddles were interesting, but I would not recommend this 15 minute experience for a $5 pricetag.
It feels like you're paying to play a sample of something much longer.
